clinical_study.brief_title: Zydena on Cognitive Function of Alzheimer's Disease Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy of Zydena (Udenafil) on Cognitive Function of Alzheimer's Disease Patients: A Randomized, Double Blind, Placebo-controlled Multicenter Study

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to determine whether Zydena (Udenafil) has positive effect on cognitive function in patients with Alzheimer's disease.
This study is a randomized, double blind, placebo-controlled multicenter study.
